channel.title: Hiking Treks
channel.itunes:subtitle: Find your trail. Great hikes and outdoor adventures.
channel.itunes:author: The Sunset Explorers
channel.itunes:summary: Love to get outdoors and discover nature's treasures? Hiking Treks is the show for you. We review hikes and excursions, review outdoor gear and interview a variety of naturalists and adventurers. Look for new episodes each week.
channel.description: Love to get outdoors and discover nature's treasures? Hiking Treks is the show for you. We review hikes and excursions, review outdoor gear and interview a variety of naturalists and adventurers. Look for new episodes each week.

item.content:encoded: The Sunset Explorers share tips, techniques and recommendations for great hikes and adventures around the United States. Listen on Apple Podcasts.
